entries.meaning: Anything characteristic of the southern part of a region, especially the southern United States.
examples: It is one of the national peccadilloes that anyone who lives north of St. Albans has some kind of prejudice against Londoners — perhaps "prejudice" is the wrong word — or rather not against Londoners but against southernism.

entries.meaning: A word or phrase (a dialectism) from Southern American English.
